backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with user profiles, voice models, and voice conversion jobs, including authorization checks and storage operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs for tracking development work.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their purpose within the UI, hooks, pages, and services.
frontend/.env: Environment file containing the actual Replicate API token used for frontend AI conversion calls.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file showing how to configure the Replicate API token.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining extensive OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the root React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, theme provider, and main route structure for the app’s pages.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the primary page layout with navigation, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with links, logo, and login control, supporting responsive mobile and desktop layouts.
frontend/src/components/AudioUploadAndSu: Form component to select a voice model, upload an audio file, and submit a conversion job with progress and error handling.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wraps child components and requires user authentication via Internet Identity, showing login prompts when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the app's static brand logo image.
frontend/src/components/EmptyStateHero.t: Displays a centered empty‑state message with optional image and action button.
frontend/src/components/InlineAlert.tsx: Inline alert UI component with icons and styles for success, error, info, and destructive variants.
frontend/src/components/JobsTable.tsx: Fetches and displays all conversion jobs in a sorted grid of JobStatusCard components.
frontend/src/components/JobStatusCard.ts: Shows the status of a conversion job with playback, download, and error handling for completed audio.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button tied to Internet Identity with loading and error recovery logic.
frontend/src/components/ModelSelect.tsx: Dropdown selector for available voice models with loading and empty‑state handling.
Displays the user's voice models with delete functionality and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/components/VoiceModelUpload: Form to upload a new voice model file with metadata, progress tracking, and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversionJobs.ts: Provides hooks to list, fetch, and create conversion jobs, including polling and progress updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state and provides login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useModelNameLookup.ts: Returns a function that resolves a model ID to its name using cached voice model data.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceModels.ts: Hooks for listing, uploading, and deleting voice models with backend integration and query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/CreateCoverPage.tsx: Page for creating AI covers, redirecting if no models exist and showing upload UI.
frontend/src/pages/JobsHistoryPage.tsx: Displays the user's conversion job history with empty state handling and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/VoiceModelsPage.tsx: Renders the voice models management page with upload form, list, and empty state, gated by auth.
frontend/src/services/voiceConversion.ts: Implements client-side Replicate-based voice conversion with token checks, data URL conversion, error normalization, and prediction polling.
frontend/src/utils/actorErrorMessage.ts: Parses backend/agent errors to extract clean, user-friendly messages by removing IC-specific prefixes.
Downloads audio blobs from the backend by converting them to a Blob URL and triggering a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/fileToBytes.ts: Converts a File to a Uint8Array with size validation and FileReader handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theming, colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, issues, and feature requirements for improving Replicate API error handling and configuration checks.
